Interrupts.Name: Get Down!
Interrupts.Trigger: An ally takes damage that would reduce them to 0 hp.
Interrupts.Effects: The Guard can dash 3. If that puts them adjacent to their ally, that ally goes to 1 hp instead, and the guard takes divine damage equal to 25% of their max hp.

Actions.Name: Shield Strike
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe is shoved 1 and must save or become winded. Winded foes take [D].

Actions.Name: On the Spot
Actions.Description: The Guard chooses a space in range 3, which could be under themselves. While standing on the spot, the Guard has resistance. This effect lasts until this ability is used again.
